me.title: Me

me.description1: Frontend knowledge of React, Redux and NextJS.
me.description2: Strong understanding of design principles, Modular CSS, and responsive design.
me.description3: I enjoy working in team-based environments and am constantly seeking ways to improve my skills and offer innovative solutions to technical challenges.
